name: Windows System Deployment Image
summary: Learn about .SDI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The SDI File Manager program is included with Windows Embedded Studio and has a command-line tool called sdimgr.exe, which can be used to create, edit, and deploy SDI images.

description: System Deployment Image (SDI) file created with Windows Embedded Studio, a program used for creating disk images for Windows; contains a boot blob, load blob, and part blob; commonly used to create RAM disks or boot disks for loading and installing Windows.
